TEST_NAME: IG Column Links should have title + aria
QUERY_CLOB:
with aapic as (
        select case
               when item_type = 'NATIVE_LINK' 
               then case when lower(trim(link_attributes)) not like '%aria-%' 
                         or lower(trim(link_attributes)) not like '%title%'
                         or trim(link_attributes) is null
                         then 'N'
                         else 'Y'
                         end
               when lower(trim(attribute_01)) like '%<a %' 
               and lower(trim(attribute_01)) not like '%aria-%' 
               and lower(trim(attribute_01)) not like '%title%' 
               then 'N' 
               else 'Y'
               end pass_yn,
               page_id,
               application_id,
               link_attributes,
               attribute_01,
               last_updated_by,
               last_updated_on,
               build_option,
               name,
               item_type,
               label,
               heading,
               parent_column_id,
               column_id,
	             workspace
         from apex_appl_page_ig_columns
    )
select aapic.pass_yn,                          
       aapic.application_id, 
       aapic.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapic.last_updated_by,
       aapic.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Interactive Grid Column `%0` (app %1, page %2) link is missing title + aria', 
        p0 => aapic.heading, 
        p1 => aapic.application_id,
        p2 => aapic.page_id) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Interactive Grid Column `%0` link is missing title + aria (app %1, page %2, colum id %3)', 
        p0 => aapic.heading, 
        p1 => aapic.application_id,
        p2 => aapic.page_id,
				p3 => aapic.column_id) issue_title,
       aapic.column_id component_id,
       aapic.parent_column_id parent_component_id,
       aapic.heading,
       aapic.label,
       aapic.item_type,
       aapic.name,
			 aapic.workspace
from aapic
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapic.page_id and aap.application_id = aapic.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapic.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapic.application_id
where aapic.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
EXPLANATION:
WCAG 2.0/2.1 - 2.4.4 Link Purpose (In Context)Checking link text is meaning as well as have alt setting.

https://stackoverflow.com/questions/27953425/what-is-the-difference-between-aria-label-and-title-attributes
FIX: This test requires that you provide both a title and an aria-label in the link attributes region
